float3.h

00001 #ifndef _MATH_FLOAT3_H
00002 #define _MATH_FLOAT3_H
00003 
00004 
00005 #include <math.h>
00006 
00007 
00008 namespace math
00009 {
00010 
00011 
00012 class float2;
00013 
00014 
00024 class float3
00025 {
00026 public:
00028     float   x;
00029     
00031     float   y;
00032     
00034     float   z;
00035 
00036 #ifdef _DEBUG
00037 
00038     float3()                                                                        {z=y=x=::sqrtf(-1.f);}
00039 #else                                                                               
00040     float3()                                                                        {}
00041 #endif                                                                              
00042                                                                                     
00044     float3( const float2& xy0, float z0 );
00045 
00047     float3( float x0, float y0, float z0 )                                          : x(x0), y(y0), z(z0) {}
00048         
00050     float3& operator+=( const float3& other )                                       {x+=other.x; y+=other.y; z+=other.z; return *this;}
00051                                                                                     
00053     float3& operator-=( const float3& other )                                       {x-=other.x; y-=other.y; z-=other.z; return *this;}
00054 
00056     float3& operator*=( float s )                                                   {x*=s; y*=s; z*=s; return *this;}
00057 
00059     float3& operator*=( const float3& other )                                       {x*=other.x; y*=other.y; z*=other.z; return *this;}
00060 
00062     float&      operator[]( int index )                                             {return *((&x)+index);}
00063                                                                                     
00065     float*      begin()                                                             {return &x;}
00066     
00068     float*      end()                                                               {return &x + 3;}
00069 
00071     float3      operator+( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x+other.x,y+other.y,z+other.z);}
00072     
00074     float3      operator-( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x-other.x,y-other.y,z-other.z);}
00075 
00077     float3      operator*( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x*other.x,y*other.y,z*other.z);}
00078 
00080     float3      operator-() const                                                   {return float3(-x,-y,-z);}
00081     
00083     float3      operator*( float s ) const                                          {return float3(x*s,y*s,z*s);}
00084     
00086     const float&    operator[]( int index ) const                                   {return *((&x)+index);}
00087 
00089     bool        operator==( const float3& other ) const                             {return x==other.x && y==other.y && z==other.z;}
00090     
00092     bool        operator!=( const float3& other ) const                             {return x!=other.x || y!=other.y || z!=other.z;}
00093 
00095     const float2& xy() const;
00096 
00098     float       length() const                                                      {return ::sqrtf( x*x + y*y + z*z );}
00099     
00101     float       lengthSquared() const                                               {return x*x + y*y + z*z;}
00102     
00104     const float*    begin() const                                                   {return &x;}
00105     
00107     const float*    end() const                                                     {return &x + 3;}
00108 
00110     float3      rotate( const float3& axis, float angle ) const;
00111 
00113     bool        finite() const;
00114 };
00115 
00116 
00120 inline float3 cross( const float3& a, const float3& b )
00121 {
00122     return float3( a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y, a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z, a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x );
00123 }
00124 
00128 inline float dot( const float3& a, const float3& b )
00129 {
00130     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z;
00131 }
00132 
00136 inline float3 normalize( const float3& v )
00137 {
00138     return v * (1.f / ::sqrtf( v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z ));
00139 }
00140 
00144 inline float3 saturate( const float3& v )
00145 {
00146     return float3( 
00147         v.x < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.x > 1.f ? 1.f : v.x),
00148         v.y < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.y > 1.f ? 1.f : v.y),
00149         v.z < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.z > 1.f ? 1.f : v.z) );
00150 }
00151 
00155 inline float3 clamp( const float3& v, const float3& minv, const float3& maxv )
00156 {
00157     return float3( 
00158         v.x < minv.x ? minv.x : (v.x > maxv.x ? maxv.x : v.x),
00159         v.y < minv.y ? minv.y : (v.y > maxv.y ? maxv.y : v.y),
00160         v.z < minv.z ? minv.z : (v.z > maxv.z ? maxv.z : v.z) );
00161 }
00162 
00166 inline float3 abs( const float3& v )
00167 {
00168     return float3( 
00169         v.x < 0.f ? -v.x : v.x,
00170         v.y < 0.f ? -v.y : v.y,
00171         v.z < 0.f ? -v.z : v.z );
00172 }
00173 
00177 float3 normalize0( const float3& v );
00178 
00179 
00180 } // math
